title: 'I Was Abducted'
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Monique has always known she was abducted as a child, but specific details about what happened, and why, have been elusive. It wasn’t until she posted to Reddit that she found real leads and painful memories started flooding back.
itunes:author: WBUR
